pages.title: The Soul Totem
pages.text: The Soul Totem is made of a lattice of Niobium, to take advantage of the way it emanates small amounts of soulus. Alone it has difficulty holding the entire power of a $(item)Soul Catalyst$(), but I solved this issue with purpur.

pages.title: Structure
pages.text: The structure is footed with Niobium to increase its base range.

Upon inserting a $(item)Soul Catalyst$(), the soul totem must first 'kickstart' itself. This will require quite a bit of soulus. However, it only has to be done once.$(p)After this point, it will emanate soulus for quite some time, with strong enough potency to allow summoners to function. It will even continue to work in your absence.

As much as I hate to say it... that's it. That's the extent of what my research has been able to provide. I feel bad, almost, to leave you with just this. It feels like I'm putting too much on your shoulders. Someone I will never know; someone I have no chance of ever meeting.$(p)I can only hope that this guide is enough.
Well, if you're reading this, I guess it $(o)was$() enough.$(p)I hope this guide has been helpful to you. Live well. May your soul stay strong, fellow soulcerer.
